mapper.insert: INSERT INTO real_estate (id,projectName, assessReportnum, assessStartTime, assessEndTime, assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, valueType, buildingArea, floorArea, assessUnitPrice, assessTotalPrice, client, firstReporter, partReporter1, partReporter1RgNum, partReporter2, partReporter2RgNum, serviceSource, branchOffice, serviceCharge, checker, assessOrg, reportType,wordUri,pdfUri,firstReporterRgNum) VALUES(#{id},#{projectName}, #{assessReportNum}, #{assessStartTime}, #{assessEndTime}, #{assessObject}, #{valueTime}, #{assessAim}, #{assessMethod}, #{valueType}, #{buildingArea}, #{floorArea}, #{assessUnitPrice}, #{assessTotalPrice}, #{client}, #{firstReporter}, #{partReporter1}, #{partReporter1RgNum}, #{partReporter2}, #{partReporter2RgNum},#{serviceSource},#{branchOffice}, #{serviceCharge}, #{checker},#{assessOrg}, #{reportType} ,#{wordUri}, #{pdfUri}, #{firstReporterRgNum});
mapper.update:
UPDATE real_estate SET projectName=#{projectName}, assessReportNum=#{assessReportNum}, assessStartTime=#{assessStartTime},assessEndTime=#{assessEndTime}, assessObject=#{assessObject}, valueTime=#{valueTime}, assessAim=#{assessAim}, assessMethod=#{assessMethod}, valueType=#{valueType}, buildingArea=#{buildingArea}, floorArea=#{floorArea}, assessUnitPrice=#{assessUnitPrice}, assessTotalPrice=#{assessTotalPrice}, client=#{client}, firstReporter=#{firstReporter}, partReporter1=#{partReporter1}, partReporter1RgNum=#{partReporter1RgNum},partReporter2=#{partReporter2}, partReporter2RgNum=#{partReporter2RgNum},serviceSource=#{serviceSource}, branchOffice=#{branchOffice},serviceCharge=#{serviceCharge}, assessOrg=#{assessOrg}, reportType=#{reportType}, firstReporterRgNum=#{firstReporterRgNum},
wordUri=#{wordUri},
pdfUri=#{pdfUri},
checker=#{checker},
id=#{id} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,projectName, assessReportNum, assessStartTime, assessEndTime, assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, valueType, buildingArea, floorArea, assessUnitPrice, assessTotalPrice, client, firstReporter, partReporter1, partReporter1RgNum, partReporter2, partReporter2RgNum, serviceSource, branchOffice, serviceCharge, checker, assessOrg, reportType ,wordUri,pdfUri,firstReporterRgNum from real_estate where id=#{id}
